message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its quality.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate you coming up. How about we meet halfway between our offers at $160?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?
